name: Dungeon Witches
description:
A tiny dungeon exploring RPG of the cute girls with magic of "Home".   (in Develop)

The girls who loves "Stay Home", but they must go to the dungeon that bad witches live, with the magic of "Home"!

Dual language supported:  English and Japanese (日本語)

- How to Play - 
  • Save the sister "Erity"! She went to deep of dungeon.
  • Search and talk to witches!  (shown as "boss") to go next.
  • This game is turn-based.  Player and enemy act in turn.
- Control -
  • Cursors ... Move, Attack
  • Z ... Magic, Talk
  • X ... Erace home, Turn skip
  • Enter ... Open system menu 
  • Hold X + Cursor ... Change direction
- Magic List -

Level1  Summon Home
    Press Z  (outer home ) 
Level1  Rest in Bed 
    Press Z  (inner home ) 
Level2  Push Home 
    Hold Z + Press cursor  (⌂ 웃 )
Level3  Kick Home 
    Press Z  (towards⌂ 웃 )
Level4  Launcher Home 
    Charge Z -> Release  (inner home )
Level5  Moving Home 
    Hold Z + Cursor  (inner home )
Level6  Warp to the Home 
    Charge Z -> Release  (outer home)

- Status View -
  • ♥  ... Life  (0 = game over) 
  • ⌂  ... Home magic point
  • ✽  ... Attack power
  • lv ... Magic level
  • E  ... Experience
  • Initial ... Learned magic
- Power up Items -
  • ♥ ... Max life +10
  • ⌂ ... Max magic point +10
  • P ... Attack power +1
